io.r2dbc.spi

Class IsolationLevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.r2dbc.spi.IsolationLevel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransactionDefinition

    public final class IsolationLevel
extends Object
implements TransactionDefinition
    Represents a transaction isolation level constant.

      • getAttribute

        public <T> T getAttribute(Option<T> option)
        Description copied from interface: TransactionDefinition
        Retrieve a transaction attribute by its Option identifier. This low-level interface allows querying transaction attributes supported by the Connection that should be applied when starting a new transaction.
        Specified by:
        getAttribute in interface TransactionDefinition
        Type Parameters:
        T - requested value type
        Parameters:
        option - the option to retrieve the value for
        Returns:
        the value of the transaction attribute. Can be null to indicate absence of the attribute.
